page.title: 20Bleak House
page.content: Leaving{Great Links Tor,}one soon comes to the two{Dunnagoats.}These are two twinned hills, both crowned with rocks, though not steep or imposing. Looking down from the top of the tors one is immediately struck by one of the lonliest sight on the moor. Across on the far bank of the Rattlebrook are the remains of{Bleak {House,}once the summit of someones dreams. Erected in the last century as part of some peat workings higher up the Rattlebrook it only worked for a few years. It is axiomatic that Dartmoor is a hard taskmaster, and the broken walls of the house echo the broken dreams that this harsh landscape brings about. In the bright sun, the house invites one; but see it in winter!
